oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, William Edward
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Portrait of Sara Carter Gaut
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sara Carter Gaut was a cousin of Adelicia Acklen. She accompanied her to Louisiana after the death of Joseph Acklen to secure and sell cotton crop during the Civil War.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gaut, Sara Carter -- Portraits; Women
Taking Care of Business
